ygData.subject: Re: Stein - An update from EQCasters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... um wrong the item has been in-game, maybe, but the quest to obtain it was broken. Gregor used to give you an ogre head (which is for another ogre quest, I
ygData.messageBody:
Tim Borelli wrote:
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> a friend of mine just brought this to my attention, something i hadnt
> thought of.
>
> if no one wants a nice item to get nerfed, dont post a spoiler on how to
> get it. this item had been in game for a while, and only recently had it
> been discovered and spoiled. now it's most likely gonna get nerfed.
>

um wrong the item has been in-game, maybe, but the quest to obtain it
was broken. Gregor used to give you an ogre head (which is for another
ogre quest, I think) instead of the barkeep compendium like he was
supposed to. verant has this perverse idea that anything useful is evil
so they nerf it (hmm, you think casters might actually want to get the
glowing stein? maybe!), and has an on-going crusade against enchanters
;) They are conspiring against us! Which leads to another question, why
in Gods name would and Ogre give out a int boosting item? HELLO! Ogres
are supposed to be stupid, and all their casters are wis based!

> lesson to be learned: dont post spoilers. they only lead to an influx of an
> item into the world at unbelievably high rates, later to be nerfed or
> removed...

Yeah if it can't be camped Verant might nerf it, and they profess to be
against camping!

>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 29th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
> Qoronita, 9th level Erudite Enchantress on Cazic-Thule
> (let's see who reaches 30 first, heh)
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
> computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
> Volition, Inc.
> timmyland@...
